name: Cyborg Game Entry
description:
This is for the Game Jam.


The year 3817 has been tough on lots and people has developed from being of one species to multiple. People have set off into space scavenging planets for any goods they can gather... Sadly they have raided your home temple where the queen "Trini" lives. You have been held accountable as it was your shift and you have been tasked to gather the artifacts back to save your life and the people of the temple. While you adventure looking on the ship for the artifacts just keep an eye out for traps as Jechno (Your Friend) can't warn you every time...
